text: Edman Ayvazyan (, 10 August 1931 â€“ 25 March 2020) was an Iranian-Armenian painter. He was born in Tehran. == Career == Ayvazyan focused on Daredevils of Sassoun, the works of Hovhannes Tumanyan, and created many portraits, landscapes, seascapes. His works can be found in many churches and museums including Lazar galley, House-Museum of Aram Khachaturian.Edik Ayvazian (Edman) ==Death== Ayvazyan died on 25 March 2020 in London, England, aged 88.London-based Armenian painter Edman Ayvazian passed away ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Iranian painters Category:Armenian painters Category:People from Tehran Category:21st-century Armenian people
title: Edman Ayvazyan
